doc:
Marc Connelly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Connelly 0 Marcus Cook Connelly (13 December 1890 – 21 December 1980) was an American playwright, director, producer, performer, and lyricist. He was a key member of the Algonquin Round Table, and received the Pulitzer Prize for Drama in 1930. Marcus_Cook_Connelly ( 13_December_1890 – 21_December_1980 ) was an_American_playwright , director , producer , performer , and lyricist . He was a_key_member of the_Algonquin_Round_Table , and received the_Pulitzer_Prize for Drama in 1930 .
